channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly tipping on public pavement., 31st July
item.description:
Repeat of ref: 7953688. Please explain just exactly how this is "not the councils responsibility"? as stated on previous reports? It is rubbish dumped on a public pavement. A pavement for which maintenance and cleanliness is the councils responsibility.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Edmeston Close, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole, 31st July
item.description:
Youâ€™re referring to number 7896973 I was told that this repairs is down to Thames water. I have had a long telephone conversation with them And they say the repair is not down to Thames water. They gave me a case number 01234511 to give to you . They would like you to contact them Thames Water to discuss the issue. I would be grateful for a reply on the outcome to resolve this situation and get the road repaired. Mr Reg Togwell r_togwell@sky.com
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Radnor Avenue, Blackfen, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: In front of Argo House, 31st July
item.description:
The tree branches need trimming, as they are obstructing the footpath. Pedestrians are forced to bend down in order to avoid potential eye injury.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kilburn Park Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tl2160554 street furniture obscured by foliage reported to highway authority, 31st July
item.description:
TEL: 31/07/2025 07:39:20 - 31/07/2025 09:08:48 Joseph Ninson Switched off signals. bagged signal aspects and PBs. but unable to bag one of the signal aspects due to foliage blocking the signal aspect. reported it to telsafe and added pic. TMs on site. site now ok.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Craignair Road, Streatham Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet
